Posts.Content: I don't know if you're experiencing resistance to the Ibrance, but you and/or your onc. might find this interesting. https://www.dana-farber.org/newsroom/news-releases/2019/unusual-...
Posts.Title: Switching to Verzenio after Ibrance

Posts.Content: I don't know where I found this article, but shown below is a link to it. It's from the Dana Farber research people. The research shows that resistance to Ibrance may be reversable by going off it for 7 weeks. https://www.dana-farber.org/newsroom/news-releases/2019/unusual-...
Posts.Title: Switching to Verzenio after Ibrance

Posts.Content: Yes, U.S. is only country that allows direct advertising to consumers. How much could they reduce the insane prices for these drugs ($11,000 monthly for Ibrance - really?) if they didn't pay billions in advertising on TV and in magazines.
Posts.Title: Commercials for Ibrance, etc.
